document_data.mainbody:
Gulthmeran Reserve was a variety of wine, produced on the southern Dragon Coast and the northern Vilhon Reach. It was exported as far as the Western Heartlands, the lands along the River Chionthar, and the city of Baldurs Gate, as of the late 15 century DR.
This high quality yet harsh-flavored wine was in high demand among those of discriminating taste palettes. It was sold in small  round green glass corked bottles.
